title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
description: Crocheted red silk ornamented with cut steel beads in minute diagonal square pattern and zig-zag band pattern.  Two rings control side opening; bead tassels of cut steel at either end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: crochet. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-47.
